New Records: The Athletics hit four home runs in the game and have homered 166 times this season, seventh-most in the major leagues.
Key Match Events: Seth Brown hit a pair of home runs, including a go-ahead three-run shot in the eighth, and the Oakland Athletics beat the Cincinnati Reds 9-6 on Wednesday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The A's scored 50.3% of its runs on homers, the highest percentage in the majors.
Others: Seth Brown is set for season-ending surgery.
